entry.title: Hug Day Hd Wallpapers 2014 Tight and Warm Hugs Hd Wallpapers
entry.content:
best Best Collection On Happy Propose Day SMS In Hindi 2014

You…????
SHOULD IT BE..???
You think ???
To see is to believe or believe when you see it???
DOES iT HAVE to BE?
Action speaks louder than words<<<<
but still words hurt more than action.
IS IT ..?????
Love for a reason Or the reason is love>>>???
come to think of it….!!!
HAVE A Wan walenthin mi khwam sukh….


best Best Collection On Happy Propose Day SMS In Hindi 2014

**Hug Day Hd Wallpapers 2014 Tight And Warm Hugs Hd Wallpapers**

….The worker must have bread,
But she must have roses…!!! too.
Help..!!! you women of privilege,
Give her the ballot to fight with.
Happy Rose Day my love
* Happy Rose Day SMS 2013

entry.title: Hug Day Facebook Fb Timeline Covers 2014
entry.content:
best Hug Day Facebook FB Timeline Covers 2014

If I could have all the time in the world,
I know what I would do:
I’d spend the time.
In pleasure sublime,
Just by being with you
Happy Confession Day

best Hug Day Facebook FB Timeline Covers 2014

Rang-gandhachya utsavat
Samil hou ya sarejan
Gudhipadvyachya shubhecha deun
happy valentine day


Hug Day Facebook Fb Timeline Covers 2014

Log ishq kartay hain baray shor kay sath,
Humne bhi kia bare zor kay sath,
Lakin ab karain gay thoray ghor kay sath,
Kyunke kal usay dekha kisi aur kay sath.
